# startIndex

**Instance Property**

An index to the first animation in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Index { get }
```

## Manipulating indices

- **endIndex**: An index to the last animation in the collection.
- **index(after:)**: Returns the position in the collection that follows an index.
- **formIndex(after:)**: Replaces the index with its successor.
- **AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Index**: An object that represents a position in the collection.
